description:
In this video I discuss the UEFICanIHazBufferOverFlow bug (CVE-2024-0762) and other UEFI/BIOS malware threats as well as how to avoid them.
https://eclypsium.com/blog/ueficanhazbufferoverflow-widespread-impact-from-vulnerability-in-popular-pc-and-server-firmware/

title: UEFI Malware - The Low Level Threat To Millions of PCs
